title: baja gOvindham
sahitya: Bhaja govindham bhaja govindham govindham bhaja moodamatheBhagavan kannan padhame sondam arivaai unndan paadamathecaraNam 1  Ulaginil palakodi uyirvagai uruvagi nizhalena thodar ndhu munne, nejamingu thelivaagumAasaigal illadha thanivazhi nee thedu, geethayin nayakan kannanin thudhi paadu. (Bhaja) caraNam 2Naa enum ahankaram, namadenum mamakaram nyanathin edhirvedham oonathin adayaalamPiravigal vaaradha perinbham nee thedu, kuzhalisai govindhan kazhalinai dhinam naadu. (Bhaja)
